About The CompanyProvider of cloud-based financial services for local & national governmentsIndustryInternetTypePrivately Held, VC-backedFounded2012Employees51-200Funding$76-$100 millionCategoriesEnterprise SoftwareGovTechSaaSInformation Technology & ServicesTechnologyAnalyticsCaliforniaComputer ScienceData VisualizationGovernmentGovernmentsHackingMaster's Degree ProgramsMiscellaneous Professional ServicesOpen DataOpen GovernmentW3CInternetSpecialtiesGovernment FinanceGovernment AccountingData VisualizationManagement ReportingBudgetingTransparencyOpen DataChart of AccountsOperational PerformanceCitizen EngagementLocal GovernmentState GovernmentBusiness ClassificationsSAASB2BEnterpriseAbout The RoleThe Vice President of Product Management will be responsible for leading the entire financial suite function to drive business growth and identify and execute market-defining product enhancements.Hiring Manager TitleChief Product Officer (CPO)Travel PercentLess than 10%FunctionsProduct ManagementInformation TechnologyKnown RequirementsBachelor's degree in the relevant field with extensive experience gained working with financial systems, accounts payable/receivable, budgeting/planning, or similar products requiredDemonstrated track record of leading, developing and bringing new products to market and a minimum of 8 years' experience in a product management position requiredSuperior level of intelligence, with a passion and drive requiredStrong technical ability with an eye for user-centric design demonstrated through exceptional products required
